name: Curried Chicken
comments: I usually serve this over rice
ingredients: 1 large bag of broccoli, frozen or fresh
seasoned bread crumbs or croutons to taste
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-size pieces. Cook broccoli, drain, and put in bottom of 8x12" casserole dish. Place chicken on top.

Mix soup, mayo and cheddar; add curry powder to taste. Spread over the chicken and sprinkle with bread crumbs. Cover with foil and bake 30-40 minutes. Uncover and bake another 10-15 minutes. Let stand about 10 minutes before serving.
